name: Weapons Trained at the Gods
description:
You witness the unseen threads of injustice, you see an evil that has no face except for every face—including yours. You see an evil that feels eternal, speaks as eternal, yet demonstrably is not.  

You see the Divine. You see the bones it stands atop. You see the rot in its throne.

 And you know what you must do. 

 It is time to Attack and Dethrone God.
